titleStmt.title: A rejoynder to the VVhiggish poem upon the Tory-prentices-feast at Merchant-Taylors-Hall.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "VVell! Tory poets answers come at last ..."
A Whig reply to: An answer to the Whiggish poem on the loyal apprentices feast.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
